summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via a new placeholder Pickup Point Dashboard page under frontend/src/pages/shop. REQ-2 cannot be confirmed from the truncated HashRouter.tsx diff (only the new page import is visible). The diff summary also indicates several unrelated UI/theme/query/layout changes that go beyond the requested “Step 1 minimal” scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new authenticated route for the Pickup Point Dashboard in the TanStack router configuration (frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx), protected by RequireAuth, reachable at a stable path such as /pickup-point-dashboard.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided HashRouter.tsx diff is truncated and only shows the new PickupPointDashboardPage import; it does not show a createRoute entry with path '/pickup-point-dashboard', wrapping in <RequireAuth>, or inclusion in the routeTree.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/style overhaul (new OKLCH color system, Tailwind config changes, warm shadow utilities, animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly says keep Step 1 minimal and focuses only on adding an empty dashboard page + authenticated route.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed React Query hooks for approval/admin checks and removed/changed user profile hooks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest says no backend methods or React Query hooks should be added for this step.

hallucinated_features.description: Shop layout changes including AuthInitializationOverlay and dialogs (DefaultTownSetupDialog, ProfileSetupDialog) and related anti-flash state handling.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and outside Step 1 scope (only new page + route).

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple unrelated shop page enhancements (landing hero, town/suburb selection styling, retailer/product pages, request form styling, multi-image product detail, etc.).
